text.section:
A violation of this subtitle:
Is an unfair or deceptive trade practice within the meaning of Title 13 of this article; and
Except for § 13-410 of this article, is subject to the enforcement and penalty provisions contained in Title 13 of this article.
A warrantor that violates the provisions of this subtitle is subject to a fine of $500 for each violation, not exceeding $10,000 for all violations.
For purposes of this section, each individual failure to comply with the requirements of this subtitle is a separate violation.
